name: forever-win
body:
## introduction
starts a windows process and then restarts it if it dies.
clearly inspired by [@nodejitsu/forever](http://github.com/nodejitsu/forever).

## usage
`forever <application> "<arguments>" [<application> "<arguments>"] ..`

## binary releases
- [release 1](https://github.com/downloads/piksel/forever-win/forever_r1.zip) - first release  
- [release 2](https://github.com/downloads/piksel/forever-win/forever_r2.zip) - adds support for handling instant termination of applications and cleaner exiting
tagline: simple tool for keeping a windows process alive
